pr_title: Add support for filters to T-Test aggregation

timeline.message:
Add support for filters to T-Test aggregation

Adds support for filters to T-Test aggregation. The filters can be used to
select populations based on some criteria and use values from the same or
different fields.

Closes #53692
Fix BWC tests until we can backport

timeline.bodyText: Should we validate/throw an exception/something if people specify an unpaired type, but don't provide filters?  Not sure where to put that validation logic but it seems we should disallow folks from basically running an unpaired test on two match-all's?
timeline.author: polyfractal

replies.author: imotov
